CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
May 2017 – present ENI S.p.A Public Affairs Department  
Position: Head of Energy Solutions, E U Publ ic Affairs (prev. Gove rnment Aff airs Manager; 
Advisor)  
Hired to ensure PA support to the newly created renewable business unit and to establish Eni’s 
credibility a nd corporate influence in the EU renewables space. Managerial role reporting into 
European Affairs SVP (two -level reporting line to group CEO).  
• Advocacy & Regulatory work: Lead on power & renewables. Responsible for coordinating work 
on Eni’s corporate  positioning and delivering advocacy strategy on key EU legislation (files: 
Renewable Energy Directive, Energy Efficiency Directive/EPBD, Competition policy review incl. 
State Aid and GBER revisions; Energy Taxation; Corporate Sustainability files; Externa l 
dimension of the Green Deal). Sits in industry associations working groups and governing body 
 (pre-Board level): incl. Businesseurope, SolarPower Europe, WindEurope, Ocean Energy 
Europe.  
• Funding and financing: Brussels lead on Recovery & Resilience Fac ility instrument, Horizon 
Europe and Innovation Fund. Monitoring and intel on funding opportunities; strategic & 
regulatory support to Eni’s businesses applying to EU funding (feasibility, application design & 
drafting coordination, related advocacy).  
• Reputation and CSR: Brussels lead on corporate sustainability initiatives incl. in development 
countries (focus on Africa). Contact point for DG DEVCO/EEAS/EU Delegations abroad.  
• C-level support: Support to CEO and Board of Directors for EU engagement (mes saging, talking 
points, briefings).  
• Management of junior staff and coordinates cross -department teams linked to EU initiatives 
(internal working groups of 20+ components).  
 
Aug 2014 – May 2017  Edelman Public Relations  Worldwide SA  
Position: Account Manager – Public Affairs, Energy and Industrials (prev. Sr Account Executive; 
AE) 
Progressively established herself as client lead for the General Electric accoun t (GE Aviation, GE 
Healthcare, GE Corporate). Core member of General Electric -Alstom acquisition PA support team for 2 
years (helping GE Europe General Counsel’s team navigate the PA/PR/media ramifications of the 
deal’s competition probe). Other clients fr om the utility, electromobility, fertilizers and aviation sector . 
• Executing integrated public affairs and communication strategies in relation to EU regulatory 
and competition issues for large corporate clients.  
• Research, analysis and reporting on var ious policy issues (Energy Union, EU funding, climate 
policy, aviation…) and industry developments (advanced manufacturing, industrial internet, 
transport automation).  
• Coordinating and delivering multi -market media and social media monitoring.  
• Media re lations and media analysis.  
• Stakeholder engagement support to executive clients.  
• Event management.  
• Agency side: account management (budgets and forecasts, reporting); new business (scouting 
and pitching); managing more junior staff, leading the offic e Quality Programme, internal 
communication and employee engagement support, assisting in junior recruitment.
